I am using uTest (with JBuilder)  to run my tests. It has worked fine up until now. I created additional AllTest files at different levels of my project hierarchy. When I press F12 to run uTest, it always runs the same AllTest, the original one I had. The message output says it is loading AllTests.AllTests, which I deleted! 
How do I instruct it to run my highest level AllTests?

Thanks,

Scott
:-> Change is inevitable except from vending machines.
subject: uTest problem
